items.name: Maloney's Mechanism
explicitMods: Has 2 Sockets
Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown

+53 to maximum Life

flavourText: a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

items.name: Aegis Aurora
explicitMods: 374% increased Armour and Energy Shield
+10% to all Elemental Resistances
+5% to maximum Cold Resistance
+6% Chance to Block
Recover Energy Shield equal to 2% of Armour when you Block

the aurora evokes both awe and power.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 40 or lower
Supported Skills deal 63% less Damage
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger Supported Spells when you take 583 total Damage from Hits
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a sudden burst of cold in a targeted area, damaging enemies. This also creates an expanding area which is filled with chilled ground, and deals cold damage over time to enemies. Enemies that die while in the area have a chance to grant Frenzy Charges. The cooldown can be bypassed by expending a Frenzy Charge.
explicitMods: Deals 34 to 51 Cold Damage
Base duration is 5.00 seconds
Deals 28.7 Base Cold Damage per second
Modifiers to Spell Damage apply to this Skill's Damage Over Time effect
25% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge when an Enemy Dies while in this Skill's Area
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: The Eternal Struggle
explicitMods: +43 to Strength
+35 to Dexterity
+32 to Intelligence
14% increased Global Defences
Critical Strikes inflict Malignant Madness if The Eater of Worlds is dominant
Kill Enemies that have 15% or lower Life on Hit if The Searing Exarch is dominant
flavourText: Simply the way it must be, so that existence may be.

explicitMods: Gain 2 Charges when you are Hit by an Enemy

items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Viridi's Veil
explicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Gems
157% increased Armour and Energy Shield
+22% to all Elemental Resistances
Damage of Enemies Hitting you is Unlucky while you have a Magic Ring Equipped
You are Hexproof if you have a Magic Ring in right slot

flavourText: "Her sisters eternally fought for that shining apex in the skies,
but Viridi instead found strength in humility."

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that adds to your armour, and can take some of the damage from hits for you before being depleted. When the buff expires or is depleted, the skill deals reflected damage to enemies around you based on the total damage that was taken from the buff. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: Base duration is 3.00 seconds
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect

75% of Damage from Hits is taken from the Buff before your Life or Energy Shield
Buff can take Damage equal to 10% of your Armour, up to a maximum of 5000
Reflects 1080% of Damage taken from Buff as Fire Damage when Buff expires or is depleted
Buff grants +328 to Armour

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casting once reserves mana to carry a banner which increases the armour and evasion of nearby allies, and reduces the critical strike chance of nearby enemies. You cannot have multiple banners at the same time.
